general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering, and milking stages are critical stages. Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Apply sprinkler irrigation to bring down the heat effect...

advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering, and milking stages are critical stages. Water deficit during these stages should be avoided.
Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Top-dress with 4% potassium to protect crop from water scarcity during summer.
High temperature increases the water requirement of maize crop. Irrigate the crop and avoid stagnant water for more than six hours.
High temperature in day hours may lead to wilting in tomato. Apply 1g Streptocyclin in 10-liter water in the root zone.
To manage brinjal shoot and fruit borer, install pheromone traps and consider spraying neem-based pesticide.
Mulch coconut leaves around a coconut tree to reduce water loss.
Cover with paper caps on the newly planted vegetable seedlings during daytime.
In shallow ponds, harvest fingerlings if water temperature rises above 30Â°C. Ensure enough water depth before introducing fingerlings.
Check the migration of caterpillars and consider dusting with Chlorpyriphos.
Check the migration of caterpillars and consider dusting with Chlorpyriphos.
Treat okra seeds with Imidacloprid before sowing to prevent whitefly infestation.
After harvesting onions, cut the tops and dry bulbs in a well-ventilated room for storage.
To control mango hoppers, spray recommended insecticides and use smoke below the plants.
